nodes.text: A submachinegun was a type of slugthrower, a rapid-fire rifle.
The submachineguns were rapid-fire slugthrower rifles. Depending on the design, these slugthrower weapons fired multiple bullets of 4–10 bursts before needing to be reloaded.
Submachineguns were used by the military of neo-atomic civilizations.

Weapons of this design also hailed from the world of Pendal. It was a rapid-fire projectile-based weapon equivalent to a more modern repeating blaster. The assassin Callandri, a native of Pendal, was noted for favoring this type of weapon.
